content: to end rnds 7 & 8 a k3 sl1 *k7 sl1 repeat from * to end rnds 9 & 10 b k4 *sl1 k7 repeat from * to end rnds 11 & 12 a k4 *k1 sl1 k6 repeat from * to end rnds 13 & 14 b repeat rnds 9 & 10 rnds 15 & 16 a repeat rnds 7 & 8 rnds 17 & 18 b repeat rnds 5 & 6 rnds 19 & 20 a repeat rnds 3 & 4 rnds 21 & 22 b repeat rnds 1 & 2 rnds 23 & 24 a k4 *k3 sl1 k4 repeat from * to end rowrow and kades page 7 daedalus socks - dk pattern toe up construction 1 toe work one round in pattern using yarn a do not cut yarn b using yarn a 2 75mm us 2 needles of your choice and judy s magic cast on or your favourite toe 3 heel part 1 up cast on cast on16 20 20 24 sts round 1 k 8 10 10 12 pm k tbl 8 10 10 12 place worked over next 24 28 32 36 sts with rs facing borm and yarn a only work back and forth as follows round 2-6 *k1 m1r k to 1 st before m m1l k1 repeat from row 1 rs k 23 27 31 35 make twst in the next * to end 36 40 40 44 sts st turn round 7 knit row 2 ws p 22 26 30 34 make twst in the next st turn round 8 *k1 m1r k to 1 st before m m1l k1 repeat from * row 3 rs k to 1 st before twst make twst in the to end next st turn round 9 knit row 4 ws p to 1 st before twst make twst in the repeat rnds 8 and 9 until you have 48 56 64 72 sts next st turn 2 patterning repeat rnds 3 & 4 until you have 8 9 11 12 sts twsts on either side and 8 10 10 12 sts in the centre charts on page 6 note letter after each round heading depicts which 4 heel part 2 colour you should use for those rnds ie b use yarn b for both rnds stated row 1 k to first twst k both strands of the twst rnds 1 & 2 b *k4 sl1 k3 repeat from * to end together make treble_crochet st into the next st turn rnds 3 & 4 a *k5 sl1 k2 repeat from * to end row 2 p to first twst p both strands of the twst rnds 5 & 6 b *k6 sl1 k1 repeat from * to end together make a treble_crochet st into the next st turn rnds 7 & 8 a *k7 sl1 repeat from * to end row 3 k to treble_crochet st k all 3 strands of the treble_crochet st together rnds 9 & 10 b
